recipe.title: How to Make Carrot Cake
recipe.intro: Carrot cake is a moist and delicious cake. It is very popular in Australian cafÃ©s, especially with cream cheese frosting on top.
recipe.ingredients: grated carrots, plain flour, sugar, eggs, vegetable oil, baking powder, cinnamon, cream cheese, icing sugar, butter, vanilla extract
steps: **Preheat** the oven to 170 degrees Celsius. **Grease** a round cake tin with butter.
**Mix** the flour, baking powder, cinnamon, and sugar in a large bowl.
**Beat** the eggs and oil together in another bowl. **Pour** into the dry ingredients.
**Grate** the carrots and **fold** them into the batter. **Stir** gently.
**Pour** the batter into the cake tin and **bake** for 40 to 45 minutes.
**Let** the cake cool completely. **Mix** cream cheese, butter, icing sugar, and vanilla. **Spread** the frosting on top of the cake.

review.text: I tried the carrot cake at Rusty's Market CafÃ© last Friday. The cafÃ© is inside the famous weekend markets. The carrot cake was moist and full of flavour. The cream cheese frosting was thick and creamy. It was not too sweet, which I liked. The cafÃ© was busy but the staff were very friendly. I also bought some fresh carrots from the market. I will try to bake my own carrot cake at home!

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Hello! Welcome. Are you ready to order?

lines.speaker: Emma
lines.text: Hi! What cakes do you have today?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: We have carrot cake, banana bread, and lemon tart.

lines.speaker: Emma
lines.text: The carrot cake sounds nice. Is it homemade?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Yes, we make it fresh every morning.

lines.speaker: Emma
lines.text: Lovely! I will have a slice, please. Does it have nuts?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Yes, it has walnuts. Is that OK?

lines.speaker: Emma
lines.text: That is fine. I love walnuts. Can I also have a cappuccino?

lines.speaker: Emma
lines.text: Regular, please. With oat milk if you have it.

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: We do! That will be fourteen dollars twenty. Enjoy your cake!

quiz3.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"With oat milk if you have it."

part_a.full_text: Hi Mum, how are you? I am good, thanks. I baked a carrot cake today! Really? That sounds wonderful. Yes, I used the recipe from work. The frosting was the hardest part. Did you put cream cheese on top? Yes, I did. It was so delicious. I will send you a photo later. Please do! I am proud of you.

part_b.full_text: Good news! Our cafÃ© is starting a weekend baking class. The first class is on March fifteenth. We will learn how to make carrot cake with cream cheese frosting. The class is from nine in the morning to twelve noon. All ingredients are included in the price. The class costs thirty-five dollars per person. You will take home your own cake at the end. Space is limited to eight people, so please book early. Call us or visit our website to sign up.

try_it.example: My favourite cake is carrot cake. I like it because it is moist and not too sweet. The cream cheese frosting on top is the best part!
